claim: APCs generally correlated with IF and hybrid journal type (Fig. 2).
title: Fig. 2.
caption: Simple linear regression models of journal impact factor (IF) vs article processing charge (APC) for A) all manuscript categories among all journals, B) research manuscripts among all journals, C) review manuscripts among all journals, D) all manuscript categories among hybrid journals, E) research manuscripts among hybrid journals, F) review manuscripts among hybrid journals, G) all manuscript categories among open access journals, H) research manuscripts among open access journals, and I) review manuscripts among open access journals.
